parts.text: {"word":"pressentir","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(フランス語)予感する、感じ取る、悟る","english_definition":"(French) to have a presentiment of, to sense, to foresee","examples":[{"sentence":"Je pressens qu'il va arriver quelque chose.","translation":"何かが起こるような気がする。","english_translation":"I have a feeling that something is going to happen."},{"sentence":"Elle pressentait le danger.","translation":"彼女は危険を予感していた。","english_translation":"She sensed the danger."}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["prévoir","deviner","sentir","intuitionner"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「praesentire」（前もって感じる）に由来。prae-（前に）+ sentire（感じる）","priority":"☆☆☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/pʁɛ.sɑ̃.tiʁ/","syllables":"pres-sen-tir"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"indicative":{"present":{"je":"pressens","tu":"pressens","il/elle/on":"pressent","nous":"pressentons","vous":"pressentez","ils/elles":"pressentent"},"imperfect":{"je":"pressentais","tu":"pressentais","il/elle/on":"pressentait","nous":"pressentions","vous":"pressentiez","ils/elles":"pressentaient"},"future":{"je":"pressentirai","tu":"pressentiras","il/elle/on":"pressentira","nous":"pressentirons","vous":"pressentirez","ils/elles":"pressentiront"},"past_historic":{"je":"pressentis","tu":"pressentis","il/elle/on":"pressentit","nous":"pressentîmes","vous":"pressentîtes","ils/elles":"pressentirent"},"past_anterior":{"je":"eus pressenti","tu":"eus pressenti","il/elle/on":"eut pressenti","nous":"eûmes pressenti","vous":"eûtes pressenti","ils/elles":"eurent pressenti"},"future_anterior":{"je":"aurai pressenti","tu":"auras pressenti","il/elle/on":"aura pressenti","nous":"aurons pressenti","vous":"aurez pressenti","ils/elles":"auront pressenti"}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"je":"pressente","tu":"pressentes","il/elle/on":"pressente","nous":"pressentions","vous":"pressentiez","ils/elles":"pressentent"},"imperfect":{"je":"pressentisse","tu":"pressentisses","il/elle/on":"pressentît","nous":"pressentissions","vous":"pressentissiez","ils/elles":"pressentissent"}},"conditional":{"present":{"je":"pressentirais","tu":"pressentirais","il/elle/on":"pressentirait","nous":"pressentirions","vous":"pressentiriez","ils/elles":"pressentiraient"},"past":{"je":"aurais pressenti","tu":"aurais pressenti","il/elle/on":"aurait pressenti","nous":"aurions pressenti","vous":"auriez pressenti","ils/elles":"auraient pressenti"}},"imperative":{"present":{"tu":"pressens","nous":"pressentons","vous":"pressentez"},"past":{}}},"participle":{"present":"pressentant","past":"pressenti"},"gerund":"pressentant"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「pressentir」は、理性的な根拠なしに、直感的に何かを感じ取ることを意味するフランス語の動詞です。英語の「sense」や「have a feeling」に近いですが、より強い予感や直感を伴うニュアンスがあります。","priority":"☆☆☆"},"common_mistakes":{},"related_words":{"derivatives":["pressentiment (名詞: 予感、虫の知らせ)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":null,"frequency_google_ngram":null,"priority":"☆☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":null,"text":"This is a relatively advanced French verb. Understanding requires knowledge of French verb conjugations and vocabulary related to intuition and feelings."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Je pressens une catastrophe.","translation":"私は大惨事を予感する。","type":"example","meaning_category":"予感する"},{"sentence":"Il pressentait la fin de son règne.","translation":"彼は自分の支配の終わりを悟っていた。","type":"example","meaning_category":"悟る"},{"sentence":"Elle a pressenti le danger et a pris des précautions.","translation":"彼女は危険を予感し、予防措置を講じた。","type":"example","meaning_category":"感じ取る"}]}
